pages.text: The Twilight Forest is an interesting place. It is something of an alternative version of the Overworld, but it is very different in a lot of ways.
There is far more variation in terms of ores here, including most (if not all) the materials the Overworld has, along with a healthy amount of new ones.
The rest of the information on this place is documented within the Traveller's Logbook. It is reccomended you read that for more information on the dimension.
